definition: Xifeng county in Tieling 鐵嶺|铁岭, Liaoning
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Xifeng county in Tieling 鐵嶺|铁岭, Liaoning

sentences.english: They only said that they would verify the issues brought up by the Xifeng officials.
sentences.chinese: 他們只說會覈實西豐官員指出的問題。

sentences.english: In Xifeng, I was mainly investigating the SMS libel case of the businesswoman .
sentences.chinese: 在西豐，我主要是調查那個女商人的短信誹謗案。

sentences.english: I got the approval of the magazine to work on this story and I went to Xifeng to gather information.
sentences.chinese: 我獲得雜誌的同意做這個故事，到西豐去收集信息。
